items.sentence: It wasn\'t Tom who dumped garbage in your front yard.
It wouldn\'t surprise me if Tom and Mary got married.
Let\'s go somewhere nice for our wedding anniversary.
Let\'s spend less time arguing and more time working.
How old were you when you learned to write your name?
I\'m not going to buy one of those, at least not yet.
I\'ve been out of the office for the past three days.
I\'ve got to be in Boston by 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
If that guitar weren\'t so expensive, I could buy it.
If there was a problem, Tom would\'ve said something.
Tom is going to show us the documents this afternoon.
Tom is here to help Mary figure out her income taxes.
Tom is learning French so he can get a better salary.
Tom is looking forward to spending the day with Mary.
I canceled my appointment because of urgent business.
I asked Tom to do the same thing that Mary was doing.
I bought a flashlight, but I forgot to buy batteries.
Tom wished that he could play tennis as well as Mary.
Tom wondered how often Mary practiced baton twirling.
Tom wondered if Mary understood what she was reading.
